Title: Those Are Chitin Words
Description:
Well now, this is certainly an interesting specimen. It seems the original creator who worked on this creature made grave errors in balancing the genetic materials. No wonder the creature you encountered was an abomination. What terrible technique!

With the right materials however, I may just be able to perfect it. Siesbarg here will be our test-subject. Perhaps his Ascension will finally catch the attention of those in charge of administering promotions!
ObjectivesText: Collect enough Nerubian Chitin for Shalba's experiment.
